author: gartung
body:
#### PR description:

Fix for this error found in `eventsetuprecord-get.txt`.

```
  File "./callgraph.py", line 36
    fields = line.split("'")
                           ^
TabError: inconsistent use of tabs and spaces in indentation
```
Also ran all of the python scripts through `autopep8 -i` and `flake8`  to catch any other errors.

#### PR validation:

Ran the scripts on output of IB static analyzer run.
title: Clean up Utilities/StaticAnalyers scripts to avoid errors because of formatting.
